description: In a surreal desert scene under a starry night, a sleeping man is covered by a blanket. Several rattlesnakes are nestled on and around him, their rattles raised. One snake appears to be directing the others, preparing for a synchronized rattling maneuver. This presents an absurd scenario where dangerous snakes are portrayed as organized participants in a strange group activity involving a human, subverting typical expectations. The image captures a moment of bizarre cooperation rather than conflict.
caption: “Okay ... on the count of three, everybody rattles.”
